text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: —— Are you all set to go?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
You look nervous, but it'll be alright. 
Reliable guides will welcome you in 
the VR world.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
The very ones all horsegirls would consider 
their progenitors — the Three Goddesses!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
The races in the WBC will 
definitely be difficult ones.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
But I'm certain you can pull through! 
You have the Grand Masters to aim for 
by winning all these races!

This is the story of how we plunged 
into a whole new world…!

text_block_list.name: Darley Arabian
text_block_list.text: The sun rises, and sets again.

text_block_list.name: Godolphin Barb
text_block_list.text:
Rising to bathe us in its warmth 
time and time again.

text_block_list.name: Byerley Turk
text_block_list.text:
As long as our determination remains 
strong, our hope, our love, and all of our 
emotions will live on in the same cycle.

text_block_list.name: Darley Arabian
text_block_list.text:
To those who have come before, 
and those who are yet to be…

text_block_list.name: Darley Arabian
text_block_list.text: They bring new encounters and old farewells.

text_block_list.name: Godolphin Barb
text_block_list.text:
They kindle blessings that 
last through the ages.

text_block_list.name: Darley Arabian
text_block_list.text: And a future brimming with color.

text_block_list.name: The Three Goddesses
text_block_list.text: The Grand Masters ～A tale of legacy～
